algorithm_technique: Simulation: repeatedly group, sum digits, and merge until string length is <= k.
problem_summary_simple: Repeatedly sum digits of string segments until the string is short enough.
problem_summary_technical: Simulates rounds of grouping string by k, summing digits in each group, and merging until length <= k.
key_insights: The core logic is a simulation of the described process.
String manipulation (slicing, joining) is key, but can be optimized by building new strings.
The number of rounds is logarithmic with respect to the initial string length and k.
